Gardena.Vermont Knolls, Los Angeles:
Vermont Knolls is a neighborhood in Los Angeles, California, within the South Los Angeles region.


== Geography ==
Vermont Knolls a 1.14-square-mile (3.0 km2) neighborhood. The neighborhood is bounded by Florence Avenue on the north, the 110 Freeway on the east, Manchester Boulevard or the Los Angeles city limits on the south and Normandie Avenue on the west.
